title: Smoking Aged Cigars and Mailbags
itunes:title: Smoking Aged Cigars and Mailbags
description:
This week we take a look at a couple of cigars from 2003 that were part of The Cigar Authority Care Package and find out why David hung on to them for so long and why he decided to share them with everyone….

We also go through The Cigar Authority mailbags that have been growing to epic proportions…

All this and more on the madness known as The Cigar Authority.
